# Changelog

## 4.0.2

* Upgrade @ebay/service-ebay to version 7.0.1 for VESE-3052

## 4.0.1

* Remove reference in serviceClient

## 4.0.0

* Remove cacheClient from ebay-fetch to reduce startup loading dukes

## 3.3.0

* Updated `@ebay/dukes-ebay` to `^3` to remove `couchbase`. Will install on M1 Macbooks now.

## 3.2.2

* Update @ebay/dukes-ebay: https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/dukes-ebay/pull/19

## 3.2.0

* setKey: replace dukes add by set (upsert behavior) and add addKey - for more info https://github.corp.ebay.com/Wonderland/ebay-fetch/pull/8

## 3.1.2

* Fix an issue when trying to get a response header value not included in the response - for more info: https://github.corp.ebay.com/Wonderland/ebay-fetch/pull/7

## 2.1.1

* Updated dependencies 

## 2.1.0

* Added a `fetch`-like interface for serviceClient

## 2.0.3

* Added map/symbol flattening to object for headers for outbound request

## 2.0.2

* nukv instruction change in readme

## 2.0.1

* Add PATCH support and add tests 

## 2.0.0

* Adding deleteBykey and change dukes version 

## 1.1.1

* modify cacheClient, serviceClient for setkey/getkey and add more logging from negative tests

## 1.1.0

* Adding cacheClient

## 1.0.0

* Initial release to public
